column1: innerRadius@ float@ REQUIRED@ 0@ Inner radius of actuator disk
column2: if greater than 0 then “donut” shape is created.

column1: outerRadius@ float@ REQUIRED@ 10@ Outer radius of actuator disk.
thickness@ float@ REQUIRED@ 0.5@ Thickness of actuator disk.

column3: 0]@ Axis of thrust of actuator disk. The cylindrical shape is rotated such its axis is aligned with axisThrust.
0]@ Position of center of the actuator disk.

column1: spacingAxial@ float@ REQUIRED@ 0.01@ Spacing along the axial direction.
spacingRadial@ float@ REQUIRED@ 0.03@ Spacing along the radial direction.
spacingCircumferential@ float@ REQUIRED@ 0.03@ Spacing along the circumferential direction.
